title: [COSMETIC] Brand has Lux rainbow particles on his hands
body: Same as title suggests- it's been like that for years, most notably on Zombie Brand given how the rainbow clashes with the green fire. Is it some kind of coding error, or accidental oversight? With Brand getting a new skin and a new splash art, it'd be great if one of his oldest cosmetic bugs gets fixed as well.

replies.body:
Hiya xXPlasmidXx,

This is actually working as intended. :]

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=NHns8gmk,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-07T22:49:21.609+0000)
>
> Hiya xXPlasmidXx,
> 
> This is actually working as intended. :]

w...wat
just wat :O

this might be the case of uber top secret riot shenanigans but... caaaare to explain why?
Not super secret - it's just how we did fire particles (he's a pretty old champion).
soooo you are saying that even annie, before her graphical update, had rainbow particles in her hands?

It's a case by case basis and different developers worked on different champions. For Brand, this is what was chosen. As mentioned above, this is something that's working as intended - I actually had to ask a dev myself to see if that was the case, because you're right, his fire/flames are a bit different from others.

Really now?

That raises more questions than I feel it answers, haha. I guess Brand is a more mysterious figure than I thought.
Yup! (I actually had to check to see if that was the case).  He's an older champion and that's part of how we did fire effects.
